content: CFS-EOS WS Edge of Slab WaterStop Edge-of-slab water sealant for use with CFS-EOS QS preformed firestop – helping contractors to reduce delays caused by weather, while improving your productivity and reducing the risk of water damage ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Ready to use joints and cavity barriers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fast-cure sealant Superior temperature ranges: 23-104 °F Suitable for below-freezing temperatures Applications Optional water tightness solution when using EOS QuickSeal at brackets and butt joints ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 72 g/l Approvals: Intertek Application: Sealants Technical Data | Approvals | Intertek | Application | Sealants | Movement | Yes | Storage and transportation temperature range | 23 - 104 °F | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2242385 - CFS - EOS WaterStop 5 Lts - Package Size 1 pc
